items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: We got this for my daughter's homecoming dress. Fit great with a few small alterations (shortened straps and added a small slit to the back to keep it from riding up) the quality of the fabric was great didn't feel cheap at all and was easy to alter without having to worry about the material being too thin. Very happy with our purchase Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: Beautiful dress - great material and fit my daughter perfectly for Homecoming without any alterations needed. Has a lace up corset back and zipper - not too short - very flattering on. Read more
items.author: Melissa Pennington

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars exactly as described
items.body: Cute little dress. fits well. It is a short dress so be prepared for that. I love the mesh that covers the slit. Read more
items.author: Chelsea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size 4
items.body: Was a lil big of in the shoulder straps other than that dress was perfect Read more
items.author: Tiffany

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars No major alterations. Daughter loved it
items.body: This fit perfectly for my daughter and she loved it. Size 0, 5'4, 118 weight. Straps were a bit long but that's an easy adjustment. I had an issue with the left hem showing at the bottom of dress. Read more
items.author: April E.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up!
items.body: Was beautiful, runs a lil small in the cup size so size up but definitely recommend! A little tricky if top heavy so be sure to tie extra tight in back. Bought in a size 16! Daughter 5'6 175lbs Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Received dress earlier than shipping date. Materials are strong, colors are vibrant. I was the life of the party!!! Read more
items.author: Shalika Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: My daughter loves this dress Read more
items.author: Cassandra Holland

short_description:
Womens Dress Mermaid Cocktail V Neck Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Mermaid Cocktail V Neck Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Fuchsia, Dusty Pink, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Peacock, Baby Blue, Lavender, Royal Blue, Teal, Turquoise, Gold, Burnt Orange, Rose Gold. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
